website_summaries.verdict: A machine built to last. For the right price, you can work your legs like a pro.
pros: Made from very solid and durable parts
Straightforward use and easy to adjust
Excellent functionality, no wobbly pieces or uncomfortable padding
cons: The larger 45-pound plates are not compatible, you'll need to stick with 35- or 25-pound plates

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after viewing several alternatives here on Amazon, and am extremely pleased. I am most happy about the price, but also that this piece of equipment is incredibly sturdy. I'm a big dude (275lbs) and this thing didn't wobble a bit or shake which was my greatest concern. The thing is solid. Another benefit, as mentioned in other reviews is, that you really don't need to put much weight onto the bar to get a good workout. So no need to empty your weight trees every time you want to use this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Due to a defective part, the pads for the leg extensions cannot be secured as the pads for the leg curls can. In addition to being unable to adjust the position of the pads for the leg extensions, the pads very noisily flop back and forth during leg curls.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: The perfect leg exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the only exercise machine I found online that is dedicated to leg lifts and leg curls. There workout benches, universals, etc that include these exercises, but they always seem to be thrown on as an after thought and don't really work that well. The Deltech leg machine, on the other hand has a perfect feel to the motion of leg lifts and curls. I especially like that there are adjustments for different leg sizes so I can set it just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dayrocker

customer_reviews.title: solidly built works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Having a home gym I got tired of having to go to a regular gym just for leg extensions and curls. I could have gotten a bench with a leg attachment but I didn't trust how they were made, looking at welds and how they were attached I didn't trust them and most weren't adjustable. This thing is solidly built, adjustable and I can't imagine it ever letting me down midway through a workout. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Von T

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase! First of all it arrived super fast, way before ETA. The instructions were clear and simple, easy to assemble. Just tried it out with the weights and I love it!! Both the curl/extension adjust to height. I am 5'4 and thought it might not adjust to me but it did. The padding is good. Its very sturdy. Leg motion is smooth. I like that for the leg extension has a stopper. This is exactly what I wanted and so happy I bought it. Hope this helps anyone looking to buy a leg curl/extension machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina McCoy

customer_reviews.title: so it is fine. The manufacturing is good
customer_reviews.text: I needed a leg extension machine for my home gym. It will be used twice a week, so it is fine. The manufacturing is good, welds are nicely done and assembly took about 1/2 hour once all the parts were laid out. 45# weights will not fit on it but I have plenty of 35# and 25# so it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: WANT A STANDALONE MACHINE FOR LEG EXTENSIONS AND CURLS??  LOOK NO FURTHER!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine for those who prefer having a standalone machine for leg curls and extensions. Easy to assemble, sturdy and a quality design. Actually you need minimal weights for the leg curls. The only problem I found was that the bolt and nut which attach the V bar that holds the weights was a bit loose, however this problem was easily resolved with two rubber washers on each side. Now the movement is nice and tight with no shaking whatsoever. When you also factor in the price this is a definite BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Namor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect machine
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use this is hands down the best leg machine for the money I have ever used. I am 6 feet and my wife is 5 3" and the machine is one of very few that is adjustable for curls and extensions. Very sturdy and smooth similar to a 2k $$ gym machines and it can handle more weight than you can lift. Highly recommend this product for the home gym. One thing I recommend is adding a few drops of machine or any light weight oil between the rubber spacers that go between the bracket and leg attachment. Makes the movement super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: wheels4

customer_reviews.title: amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the quality of this prone leg curl. Was missing curls and extensions after gym closures. Found this and I'm glad I pulled the trigger on it. It's well made and sturdy. I fit on it and I'm 6 ft 2. lastly, this thing murders my hamstrings.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Satan

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: First off the box it came in seemed reused . there was a little rust on some pieces .assembly was easy except for the knob to adjust leg extension length. The knob would not go all the way in because the holes didn't line up. Luckily for this company I know how to fix things. If I didn't I would have returned it. So ur taking a chance that it wasn't manufactured correctly. But!!!! Once assembled it is very sturdy and smooth. Have gotten a great leg workout out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy M.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, efficient and the price is low.
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service EVER!!! the machine is rock solid, very easy to assemble and does not take much weight to get an insane burn. Great addition to my garage gym. It's pretty big, takes a lot of room. It has been a while since I got this machine. Still solid and loving it! No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and in this case I can say that I feel I get a good workout on both the leg extension and curl
customer_reviews.text: Agreed with other reviews that this is a very solid machine. Every machine I have ever used has it's own "personality", ie, how it accomplishes the exercise, and in this case I can say that I feel I get a good workout on both the leg extension and curl. A machine with weights on it will feel different than a cable machine. I prefer weights. I am 5'7" and it fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L Fischer

customer_reviews.title: The very best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect leg extension piece of equipment. The price was great and easy to assemble. Looked forever for this particular piece of equipment. Tried Dick's but theirs was a piece of carp
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Very good leg extension and curl equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy home gym equipment. Very smooth operation during both leg extension and curls. You will not be disappointed. They do adjust for you legs.
customer_reviews.author: RetDetSgt

customer_reviews.title: Very well built. After assembling it all I ended ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. After assembling it all I ended up taking the handles off. They are not necessary unless you are pumping very heavy weights. They just get in the way of mounting and dismounting.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together.very solid.should have bought this one a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: chuck slater

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: I rated this a 4 of 5 stars and here's my video review of the product: [...] Overall it's heavy duty but there were some minor issues I had with the machine. A great buy for the price and very helpful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: LiftingDad

customer_reviews.title: Good but not top quality
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to so, cosmetically a bother though. The bar that holds weight plates is crooked... noticeably. And the bench that you lay your torso on is leaning left. I've tightened and loosened bolts to see if that was an issue, but no luck. They sent me replacement parts and still no luck :/
customer_reviews.author: Will Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Next Best Thing To A Commercial Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a "commercial" leg extension / curl machine and in my opinion, my Deltech is the next best thing. It is very sturdy and stable. It came with good instructions and the tools required for assembly (think IKEA). All pads are thick. The handles under the seat are reversible. No missing bolts, nuts or washers. The seller included additional metal plates to add structural support for the "legs" and the inclusion of special washers stabilized the pivot point. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for price. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for price. Nice and sturdy and adjustable for different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with handle piece missing, called Deltech and received piece overnight. Great response. Overall good piece of equipment for home use.Assembly not an issue. Definitely better than most of the leg attachments on low cost benches.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Biscan

product_meta.title: Deltech Fitness Leg Extension/Leg Curl Machine
